name: sparqljs
description: A parser for the SPARQL query language
author: Ruben Verborgh <ruben.verborgh@gmail.com>

scripts.build: jison lib/sparql.jison -p slr -m js -o lib/SparqlParser.js && echo 'module.exports=SparqlParser' >> lib/SparqlParser.js
scripts.spec:earl:query: npm run spec:query --silent -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-query.ttl
scripts.spec:earl:update: npm run spec:update --silent -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-update.ttl
scripts.spec:earl:star: npm run spec:star --silent -- -o earl -p spec/earl-meta.json > spec/earl-star.ttl
scripts.spec:all: npm run spec:base && npm run spec:query && npm run spec:update && npm run spec:star
scripts.spec:earl: npm run spec:earl:query && npm run spec:earl:update && npm run spec:earl:star
